sentences.english: It’s no doubt that Black Friday will be busier this year than it ever has been.
sentences.chinese: 毋容置疑，今年的黑色星期五將會更爲繁忙。

sentences.english: We need some fresh blood- that's for sure.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要一些新血是毋庸置疑的。

sentences.english: There can be no gainsaying of the fact that racial injustice engulfs this community.
sentences.chinese: 無可置疑的事實是，種族不公平籠罩着該市黑人社區。
這個數字上的差異是不容置疑的。

sentences.english: There is little doubt that maternal-child interaction plays a very important role in child development.
sentences.chinese: 親子互動關係對子女成長的重要性，已不容置疑。

sentences.english: No one should doubt our commitment to Afghanistan and its people.
sentences.chinese: 我們對阿富汗及其人民的承諾是毋庸置疑的。

sentences.english: His brilliance renders this film an indubitable classic.
sentences.chinese: 他的出色表現讓這部電影成爲了毋庸置疑的經典。

sentences.english: There is no doubt that they will be the champion of the CSL, (short for China's Super League).
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，他們將成爲中超聯賽的冠軍。

sentences.english: There is little question that religion meddles in politics.
sentences.chinese: 宗教干預政治是無可置疑的。

sentences.english: It would not be easy, no question about that. But we have counting rules now.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，這並非易事，但我們現在已有了計分規則。

sentences.english: In the decades that followed, though, the effects were undeniable.
sentences.chinese: 然在接下來的十年中，輻射的影響是無容置疑的。

sentences.english: It goes without saying that the Chinese ink painting holds very particular connotations.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，水墨作爲畫材具有非常特殊的意義。

sentences.english: The facticity of manuscript is indubitability.
sentences.chinese: 手稿的真實性是毋庸置疑。

sentences.english: Sure, we all know that Valentine's Day is a racket.
sentences.chinese: 毋庸置疑，大家都知道情人節是個騙錢的玩意兒。

sentences.english: T-mac is the man for the clutch shot without a doubt.
sentences.chinese: 勿庸置疑，麥迪就是能把握進攻的那個人。
不容置疑地，我就開始戰勝他。

definition: to belittle/to look down upon/to despise
to offer an opinion/to comment (on the issue)/to have a say (in the matter)
lit. to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom)/fig. resolute and decisive/unhesitating/categorical
